prompt: This striking image features a futuristic riot police robot mounted on an alien-like horse, imposing and powerful against the backdrop of a futuristic Martial landscape. Inspired by the style of Rafal Olbinski, the scene captivates with its blend of sci-fi and fantasy, showcasing a unique and intriguing vision of a future world in turmoil.
